title: STAT+: A promising sickle cell pill and a new way to treat myelofibrosis
description: At ASH 2025, Fulcrum presented promising data on a sickle cell pill and Incyte is pioneering a new way to treat myelofibrosis.
content: At ASH 2025, Fulcrum presented promising data on a sickle cell pill and Incyte is pioneering a new way to treat myelofibrosis.
